name: source
description: ESLint and prettier dependencies to be used within the solution

scripts.install:custom-resource: cd ./custom-resource && npm run clean && npm ci
scripts.install:image-handler: cd ./image-handler && npm run clean && npm ci
scripts.install:demo-ui: cd ./demo-ui && npm run clean && npm ci
scripts.install:dependencies: npm run install:metrics-utils && npm run install:custom-resource && npm run install:image-handler && npm run install:demo-ui
scripts.bump-child-version: npm --prefix ./image-handler run bump-version && npm --prefix ./custom-resource run bump-version && npm --prefix ./constructs run bump-version && npm --prefix ./solution-utils run bump-version && npm --prefix ./demo-ui run bump-version
